Welcome to this place! ;)

I am **Joaquín Martínez-Minaya**, currently working as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Applied Statistics and Operations Research and Quality at Polytechnic University of Valencia. My research focus spans a variety of areas, with a primary emphasis on **Spatio-temporal Statistics**, **Bayesian Computing**, **Mixed Models** or **Compositional Data Analysis**. Also applying these research interests to the fields of species distribution, healthcare, and environmental studies.
